npcSpeech.text: Well well well. If it isn't Mr. High and mighty inspector!
Oh, like you have no clue! IHCC sacked me yesterday and I blame you! I asked you to put in a good word to management about me but you didn't did you?
Oh you're just so ironic aren't you.
Oh what? You want to get by?

Strange eh... I wonder who could help you with that... You know times are tough, a fellow does what he needs to to get by. Perhaps I could fix it for you, of course you'd have to give me something in return.
Extorting! Oh I would never use a word so strong. How about asking for a favour?
First you're going to have to pay me. How does 3 bucks sound considering I'm not getting paid this month.
I don't know, three bucks doesn't go very far these days... It stays at three.
Great let's do it. Give me a few minutes to fix it.

response.text: I didn't mean for you to lose your job.

npcSpeech.text: I thought you would help me you know. An Imp like you who is an inspector must care about his ellow creature. Unless this was revenge for me going through the transformation. Maybe you're a purist. If so that's sick. You're holding us all back. We have a right to change.
Badabing! Ok it's all good, it should be working again.
We all do what we need to.
Welcome. Also don't worry, I won't be doing this to you again.
